settings.heading: WORKSHOPS
settings.text_content:
I'm temporarily taking a break from throwing classes because I'm currently fully immersed in the world of glazing. I recently started producing SOGO glazes, but I also continue to offer glazing workshops both domestically and internationally. I also regularly teach glazing courses at my own small glaze factory in Deurne.

If everything goes more smoothly, I wouldn't rule out resuming the spinning workshops. So be sure to sign up for the waiting list for future events. You can do so through the relevant workshops in the webshop or using the buttons on this page. 

Do you have Feel free to contact me for information and pricing. 

Still interested in a spinning lesson? I'm also offering a digital workshop called "Series Spinning" in collaboration with De Cursist .

Scroll down to see which courses I'm currently offering! You can book through the webshop. Workshops full? Be sure to join the waiting list through the webshop. This way, you'll have a much better chance of being in the next course.
